question: United Nations Security Council has recently approved the resolution of which country, on its deal with the Taliban militant group?
explanation:
United Nations Security Council has recently approved the resolution of United States, on the recent agreement between the US and the Afghan Taliban.
The Security Council asked the Government of the Afghanistan to develop the peace process, and to participate in intra-Afghan negotiations through an inclusive negotiating team. As per the February 29- agreement, the US military has begun withdrawing its troops as part of the pull-out agreed. Recently the President Ashraf Ghani and his rival and former chief executive Abdullah Abdullah both claimed to be the winners of the Presidential election.
